segments.text: The kitchen looks like a typical daytime setup with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands by the sink area, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing away slightly, focused on polishing the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, and the basin is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows steadily onto the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle widens on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy is on a step stool near the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears tilted, with legs not quite steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, one arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up expectantly at the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR
